@domenic I believe we should also file spec bugs with Firefox and Safari for the changes to *default readers* in https://github.com/whatwg/streams/pull/1168 ? That PR affects *both* default and BYOB readers.
content.formatted_body: @domenic I believe we should also file spec bugs with Firefox and Safari for the changes to default readers in https://github.com/whatwg/streams/pull/1168 ? That PR affects _both_ default and BYOB readers.
